p: Some species of Eriope also produce lignans. Raffauf et al. (1987) reported the isolation of β-peltatin ( 115) and α-peltatin ( 148) from Eriope macrostachya Mart. ex Benth. Further studies led to the identification of β-peltatin ( 115), yatein ( 120), podophyllotoxin ( 124) and α-peltatin ( 148) in the aerial parts of Eriope blanchetii ( David et al., 2001) and Eriope latifolia ( Santos et al., 2011).
